short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects a button to the contexto.me page to display the answer to the current contexto.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to find the answer to the current contexto you are stuck on. It uses a publicly avaliable API (https://api.contexto.me/machado/en/top/*) to find the answers to the puzzle. It is the same one used at the end of a game when you check "Closest Words"
